data.meta_description: Discover life events, stories and photos about Captain Thomas Thurston (1658â1704) of Medfield, Suffolk, Massachusetts Bay Colony, British Colonial America.
data.text: When Captain Thomas Thurston was born on 11 February 1658, in Medfield, Suffolk, Massachusetts Bay Colony, British Colonial America, his father, Thomas Thurston, was 24 and his mother, Sarah Thaxter, was 22. He married Mehetable Mason on 23 July 1685, in Wrentham, Norfolk, Massachusetts, United States. They were the parents of at least 2 sons and 2 daughters. He lived in Medfield, Norfolk, Massachusetts, United States in 1658. He died on 15 December 1704, in Wrentham, Suffolk, Massachusetts Bay Colony, British Colonial America, at the age of 46, and was buried in Franklin, Norfolk, Massachusetts, United States.
